title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 2358/85 of 14 August 1985 amending Regulation (EEC) No 2006/80 determining the intervention centres for cereals
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 2358/85
of 14 August 1985
amending Regulation (EEC) No 2006/80 determining the intervention centres for cereals
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: Part 'FRANCE' of the Annex to Regulation (EEC) No 2006/80 is hereby replaced by the Annex to this Regulation.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 14 August 1985.
For the Commission
Nicolas MOSAR
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 281, 1. 11. 1975, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 107, 19. 4. 1984, p. 1.
(3) OJ No L 130, 19. 5. 1976, p. 8.
(4) OJ No L 197, 30. 7. 1980, p. 1.
(5) OJ No L 225, 22. 8. 1984, p. 5.
